summary: New project ("vaani") with intent to publish/deploy a testing build.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- VAANI header wordmark/logo in SVG (vaani-logo-header.dim_240x64.svg)

existing_features.title: Redeploy the existing VAANI project (do not initialize a new project) to produce a publicly accessible testing build, retrying deployment if the previous attempt errored.

After redeploying, verify the live testing build against the checklist in `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md` (initial unauthenticated load, login flow, authenticated navigation, logout flow, idle timeout, logo verification, and console verification).
